item.title: left 4 dead 3 countdown starts and is probably bullshit
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
When the counter reaches zero, it’ll reverse and start counting upwards. Then it becomes a case of who knows when it will be released. That’s Valve’s usual modus operandi.
